nodes.bodyText:
{@code com.puppycrawl.tools.checkstyle.TreeWalker}
as it is javadoc and type is real, lets have good link in javadoc html files.

javadoc is  class descrition, we have to be exact on this level.
It might be weird, but we need real type in setter so - int[].
metadata generator and xdoc generator will make it subsetOfTokenTypes as it is very special property. The same will be for all other special types.
